org.waarp.ftp.core.data.handler

Class FtpDataModeCodec

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.netty.channel.ChannelHandlerAdapter
      • io.netty.channel.ChannelInboundHandlerAdapter
        • io.netty.channel.ChannelDuplexHandler
          • io.netty.handler.codec.ByteToMessageCodec<DataBlock>
            • org.waarp.ftp.core.data.handler.FtpDataModeCodec
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    io.netty.channel.ChannelHandler, io.netty.channel.ChannelInboundHandler, io.netty.channel.ChannelOutboundHandler

    public class FtpDataModeCodec
extends io.netty.handler.codec.ByteToMessageCodec<DataBlock>
    First CODEC :
    - encode : takes a DataBlock and transforms it to a ByteBuf
    - decode : takes a ByteBuf and transforms it to a DataBlock
    STREAM and BLOCK mode are implemented. COMPRESSED mode is not implemented.

    • Nested Class Summary
